sentences.english: In the year of the jubilee all shall return to their possessions.
sentences.chinese: 在這喜年內，人各歸其祖業。

sentences.english: This year, we need to focus on the following five areas.
sentences.chinese: 年內要重點抓好五個方面。

sentences.english: In 15 years, it's projected to climb to 85%.
sentences.chinese: 在15年內，這一數字預計將升至85%。

sentences.english: Statistics suggest that the population of this country will be double in ten years' time.
sentences.chinese: 統計顯示，這個國家人口在10年內將增加一倍。

sentences.english: During the year, 864 applications were received.
sentences.chinese: 年內，放債人註冊處共收到864宗申請。

sentences.english: The money will be invested by Italy over a 25-year period. Sabina Castelfranco reports from Rome.
sentences.chinese: 意大利將在25年內以投資的形式付清這筆錢。

sentences.english: Will Hollywood still be the filmmaking capital of the world in 40 years?
sentences.chinese: 未來40年內好萊塢依然會是電影製作中心嗎？

sentences.english: The company will try to find a clear direction by r's end, Mr. Masuko said.
sentences.chinese: 益子修說，公司將盡量在年內找到一個清晰的方向。

sentences.english: That house has changed hands three times in five years.
sentences.chinese: 那棟房子在5年內易手了3次。

sentences.english: The money will be invested by Italy over a 25-year period.
sentences.chinese: 意大利將在25年內以投資的形式付清這筆錢。

sentences.english: After, during 3 years, we didn't do anything, as if nothing ever happened that winter.
sentences.chinese: 此後3年內杳無消息，就像什麼都不曾發生過。

sentences.english: During 1997, the special investigative powers were used in a number of major investigations.
sentences.chinese: 年內，警方曾在數宗重要調查中運用特殊的調查權力。

sentences.english: The yearly uneven degree of runoff distribution in Yulin River Catchment was deeper than Xinlin River Catchment.
sentences.chinese: 育林溝的年內徑流分配不均勻程度比新林溝大。

sentences.english: Health care reform must happen this year.
sentences.chinese: 無須贅言，事不宜遲，這項改革年內一定會展開。

sentences.english: The company will release more episodes for the game throughout this year.
sentences.chinese: 公司將於今年內發佈更多這款遊戲的劇集。

sentences.english: Such a treaty would not improve existing treaties in place for 40 years, Mahley said.
sentences.chinese: 他說，該協議在40年內將不會改善現行的協議。

definition: achievement/accomplishment/(in more recent usage) performance (of a business, employee etc)/results
property/real estate/abbr. for 物業管理|物业管理[wu4 ye4 guan3 li3], property management
